name: The Void (itch) (JensonDev)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022

The Void is a game where you have to escape infinite generating rooms by finding an escape portal before you are consumed by the black hole.

*No WebGL build because materials didn't work ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Credits

Created by: Jenson Marcos

Assets: PolygonSciFiSpace - Synty Studios

Music: Average - Patrick Patrikios, Forget Me Not - Patrick Patrikios
